welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Liberty, where small-town charm meets big-city excitement! Get ready to experience our friendly community, rich history, and delicious food. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves domestic flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Downtown Airport serves international flights and offers duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport features a modern and efficient design, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
